channel.title: Dplyr on Daniel Reis Pereira 2
channel.description: Recent content in Dplyr on Daniel Reis Pereira 2

item.title: dplyr_** examples, oh!
item.description: SuperDataScience has an interesting example of using the advanced dplyr functions (summarise_xx, mutate_xx as well as starts_with() and one_of() ) on top of the AirPassengers data. Watch the video here: https://youtu.be/cavtFdvII4A And here’s the code: Create the dataset: library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(tidyverse) ## Loading tidyverse: ggplot2 ## Loading tidyverse: tibble ## Loading tidyverse: tidyr ## Loading tidyverse: readr ## Loading tidyverse: purrr ## Conflicts with tidy packages ---------------------------------------------- ## filter(): dplyr, stats ## lag(): dplyr, stats air_passengers <- data.
